attributes.review: I absolutely love my president,but this app is the worst!It hacked my phone and I couldn‚Äôt download anything else!!!I am really disappointed because I wanted to know what my president was doing to better our country.this application is very slow and bad.i think it deleted all of my pictures and messed up my text application.DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!THIS IS A CHEAT IT DOESNT EVEN DO ANYTHING.

attributes.title: Loud noise coming from phone after downloading
attributes.review: I heard there was an app for Trump supporters and I got super excited because the texting service wasn‚Äôt working for me. However, when I opened the app, and looked through the available options, my phone screen turned off. It then proceeded to began blaring ‚ÄúTrump 2020‚Äù in a deep voice. The noise from my phone caused my mother to lose her hearing. It plagued us day and night for over a week. I could not sleep, eat, or simply relax in my house without the noise constantly playing in the background. I tried to turn my phone off, but the app possessed it. My ears bleed, I hear it in my thoughts now, the drone a never ending reminder of this app. My mother moved away from the house, and now I live alone only to hear ‚ÄúTrump 2020‚Äù endlessly blaring from my phone. It rings in my ears. I have tried to break my phone, burn it, anything to end my suffering. Alas, it did not. I set it on a little boat and sent it off to sea. Now, the fish in the middle of the Pacific must live with the intolerable noise, the echoing voice of ‚ÄúTrump 2020‚Äù. I have downloaded the app on my Ipad once more, only to leave a one star review for it leaving my life in shambles.

It got progressively louder for about 10 minutes until it stopped and my phone seamed like it went back to normal. But when I was checking to see if anything changed, I realized that all of my emails were gone, and about like half of my 3000 photos got deleted. I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs up, but DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
